mapper.sql: a.fjcl_id AS "fjclId", a.xq_id AS "xqId", a.fjcl_code AS "fjclCode", a.fjcl_name AS "fjclName", a.fjcl_ext AS "fjclExt", a.fjcl_url AS "fjclUrl", a.fjcl_size AS "fjclSize", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
